definition: to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently

sentences.english: The man took it and asked what he had to pay his shave.
sentences.chinese: 賣掃帚的人拿回了掃帚，隨後問修面要付多少錢。

sentences.english: Other chapters are available in our e-Library.
sentences.chinese: 在隨後的章節裏，我們將分別考察每一個因素。

sentences.english: Following that, the two heads of state jointly met with journalists from the media of China, Chile and other countries.
sentences.chinese: 隨後兩國元首共同會見了中智兩國和國際傳媒記者。

sentences.english: Mr. Clinton flew to his home in Chappaqua, N. Y.
sentences.chinese: 隨後克林頓搭機前往其在紐約查巴克的家。

sentences.english: Then the price of oil began a nearly two-decade slide.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，石油價格開始了近二十年的下滑。

sentences.english: Afterward, the reporter then contact the West jinlingzhen related leadership to carry out inspections.
sentences.chinese: 隨後記者隨後聯繫西嶺鎮的相關領導到現場進行勘察。

sentences.english: Afterward, the reporter then contact the West jinlingzhen related leadership to carry out inspections.
sentences.chinese: 隨後記者隨後聯繫西嶺鎮的相關領導到現場進行勘察。

sentences.english: The tsunami that followed engulfed the northeast and wiped out entire towns.
sentences.chinese: 隨後的海嘯淹沒了日本東北，吞沒了整個城鎮。

sentences.english: Then proceed to the boiler, deal with the trap, and obtain another dull gray key.
sentences.chinese: 隨後走到鍋爐處，解除陷阱，取得另一枚塵灰色鑰匙。

sentences.english: He was traveling in the Low Countries, and subsequently became acquainted with the Pilgrims' church in Leiden.
sentences.chinese: 他到低地國家旅行，隨後與萊頓的清教徒教會相熟。

sentences.english: He then closed, moved to Sydney, and the whereabouts of the newsstand workers in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 他隨後結束營業，遷至悉尼，並在林暋的報刊亭幫工。

sentences.english: Then the government allowed more teleshopping.
sentences.chinese: 隨後政府允許更多的電視購物。

sentences.english: He then brings her heart home to feed his dog.
sentences.chinese: 隨後他將屍體的心臟帶回家餵狗。

sentences.english: He wormed himself into my confidence and betrayed me after that.
sentences.chinese: 他漸漸騙取了我的信任，但隨後背叛了我。

sentences.english: Zheng Tao was later taken to a local hospital with a jaw injury.
sentences.chinese: 隨後張濤因下頜受傷而被送進了醫院。

sentences.english: Then bless the Earth Mother in return for the love she has given you.
sentences.chinese: 隨後在她給予你的愛中迴向祝福地球母親。

definition: and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
in turn/successively/one after the other/bit by bit
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
